name: Zytron: Mega Blast
overview: Zytron: Mega Blast is a horizontal scrolling shoot em up for the Commodore 64. It was developed and self-published by Kevin Murphy in 1990. Story: You play the part of Jez Bullet, commander of the fighter ship ZYTRON. Battle your way through 20 worlds of alien infested landscapes. A massive 200 screens of nonstop shoot 'em up action. Extra weapons, a map of the galaxy, ultra smooth scrolling and devious attack waves are just some of the features of this game.
